evidence.claim: Waylight utilizes AWS for cloud services including Lambda and API Gateway for event-driven architecture.
The platform is designed to handle health data in compliance with HIPAA regulations.
Waylight integrates with HL7 and FHIR standards for interoperability with EHRs.
They have resources and case studies mentioning collaboration with various health data platforms using FHIR.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of handling X12 transactions or serving as a clearinghouse.
